title: Paolo Gentiloni
summary: Paolo Gentiloni Silveri (Italian pronunciation: [ˈpaːolo dʒentiˈloːni]; born 22 November 1954) is an Italian politician who has served as European Commissioner for Economy in the Von der Leyen Commission since 1 December 2019.[2] He previously served as Prime Minister of Italy from December 2016 to June 2018.[3][4]
